options.content: Percona Monitoring and Management

Percona Monitoring and Management (PMM) is an open source database observability, monitoring, and management tool. It provides an in-depth drill-down analysis of your database environment, allowing you to uncover new database performance patterns and use these insights for troubleshooting and performance optimization.

**Did you know?**

PMM is the heart of the Percona Platform â€” where you can gain access to the best open-source solutions, support, services, and insights to run your database environments at peak performance in the cloud or on-premises.

Want to get more from PMM? [Check out the Percona Platform now](https://portal.percona.com/). 

**PMM Documentation**

Please consult the official [PMM documentation](https://www.percona.com/doc/percona-monitoring-and-management/2.x/index.html) to learn more about PMM. Also of interest are the [Release notes](https://www.percona.com/doc/percona-monitoring-and-management/2.x/release-notes/index.html) and [FAQ](https://www.percona.com/doc/percona-monitoring-and-management/2.x/faq.html) for common questions about PMM.

panels.description: Display the number of Advisors checks identified as failed during its most recent run.
panels.title: Failed Checks

targets.expr:
sum(rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name",device!="lo"}[$interval]) 
or irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name",device!="lo"}[5m]) 
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) 
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))
+
sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name",device!="lo"}[$interval]) 
or irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name",device!="lo"}[5m])
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) 
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))

sum by () (sum by (node_name)(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]),
sum by (node_name)(mongodb_connections{node_name=~"$node_name",state="current",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]),
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(pg_stat_database_numbackends{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval])),
sum by (node_name) (proxysql_connection_pool_conn_used{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]),
sum by (node_name) (increase(haproxy_frontend_connections_total{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]))
)

sum by () (
(rate(mysql_global_status_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) or 
irate(mysql_global_status_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])), 
(rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])),
((rate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) + 
rate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])) or
(irate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) + 
irate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]))),
(rate(proxysql_connection_pool_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) or
irate(proxysql_connection_pool_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])),
(rate(haproxy_backend_sessions_total{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) or irate(haproxy_backend_sessions_total{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])))

panels.description: RAM (Random Access Memory) is the hardware in a computing device where the operating system, application programs and data in current use are kept so they can be quickly reached by the device's processor.
panels.title: RAM

targets.expr:
clamp_max(avg by (node_name) (sum by (cpu) ( (clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) )),1) *100 or
sum by () (avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!="idle", mode!="total"}[$interval]) or avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",mode!="idle", mode!="total"}[5m]))

(sum(rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or
irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) or 
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) + 
(sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) or 
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))

sum by()((max_over_time(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) or 
label_replace(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{node_name=~"$node_name",node_type="remote",environment=~"$environment"},"node_name","pmm-server","","")),
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{node_name=~"$node_name",state="current",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]),
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(pg_stat_database_numbackends{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval])),
sum by (node_name) (proxysql_connection_pool_conn_used{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}), increase(haproxy_frontend_connections_total{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]))

sum by (node_name) (
(rate(mysql_global_status_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) or 
irate(mysql_global_status_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])),
(rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{node_name=~"$node_name",type!="command",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])),
((rate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) + 
rate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])) or
(irate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) + 
irate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]))),
(rate(proxysql_connection_pool_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) or
irate(proxysql_connection_pool_queries{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m])),
rate(haproxy_backend_sessions_total{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) or irate(haproxy_backend_sessions_total{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]))

min by (node_name) (mysql_global_status_uptime{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"} or 
mongodb_instance_uptime_seconds {node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"} or 
pg_postmaster_uptime_seconds{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"} or proxysql_mysql_status_proxysql_uptime{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"} or
(time() - haproxy_process_start_time_seconds{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}))
